charging.label: EcoFlow RAPID Pro 20k
charging.model: EcoFlow RAPID Pro, einziehbares USB-C-Kabel, 20.000 mAh, 230W - 72Wh
charging.power_per_port:
C-Kabel: 100W OUT / 100W IN
C1 : 100W OUT / 100W IN
C2 / C3: 65W OUT
Pogo Pins: 120W IN
charging.power_distribution:
C-Kabel + C1 = 100W + 100W
C-Kabel / C1 + C2 / C3 = 100W + 65W
C2 + C3 = 12W + 12W
C-Kabel + C1 + C2 / C3 = 100W + 65W + 65W
Alle Ports = 100W + 100W + 12W + 12W
charging.protocols:
C-Kabel: PD3.0
C1: PD3.0, UFCS, QC3, AFC, FCP, SCP, Apple2,4A, DCP
C2: PD3.0, UFCS, QC3, AFC, FCP, SCP, SFCP, Apple2,4A, DCP
C3: PD3.0, UFCS, QC3, AFC, FCP, SCP, SFCP, Apple2,4A, DCP
charging.notes: Mit App-Support, mit Pogo Pins zur Aufladung, Kabellänge 60cm
